name: Catacomb Connector
description:
This game was made for: https://itch.io/jam/vimjam

With the jam focus: Collectables

And the theme: There and back

Welcome to Catacomb Connector. 

In this game, you play as an adventurer who has made his way to the end of the catacombs, in which he has collected all except one "Game gems". The last game gem is waiting for him at the end of the catacomb, but when he takes it, a trap is activated and a bunch of boulders scatter throughout the dungeon. He loses all of his gems because of this. 

The adventurer loves collecting, so he does not hesitate to collect the game gems again, while this time also collecting the boulders. But, in order to do so, the player must help him to connect the start and end point of the catacomb. At the end one of the boulders can be found. The goal is to go "There and back" to the start to collect the boulders.

Controls:

Use "W, A, S, D" to move

Use "Left mouse button" to throw your hat

Press "R" to restart the level at any time

Press "Esc" to open the menu

While in the catacomb connect section as can be seen in screenshot 2: Use "LMB or RMB" to select a tile on the left and place it on the right side to create a path from the start to the end. You can reset all tiles using the reset button or by pressing "R" and you can test your catacomb by pressing play on the top right of the screen.

Made by Jertlam using unity
